definition: to discuss/reason (behind sth)
to state/to say (the quoted words)
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: “你要的來了，”他粗聲粗氣說道。

sentences.english: There was no territorial incursion, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 沒有入侵領土，防衛省說道。
“那真是個慈善家，”艾倫猛然說道。

sentences.english: 'Jump up, ' said the man. 'Is that your boy?
sentences.chinese: “上來吧，”車把式說道，“這是你兒子？”

sentences.english: Masa, " he said, having cleared his throat several times."
sentences.chinese: “瑪莎，”他清了幾個嗓子後說道。

sentences.english: She became so happy and smiled, saying 'I'll take it right now.'
sentences.chinese: 她非常高興，笑容滿面，說道‘我現在就賣。’

sentences.english: “I want that question mark there,” said Staub.
sentences.chinese: “我想這兒要留一個問號，”斯桃波說道。

sentences.english: "This was the blackest cross-roads of my entire life, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “這是我一生中最難決擇的時期，”他說道。

sentences.english: "You have to be careful here," he says.
sentences.chinese: “你在這裏必須十分小心，”他說道。

sentences.english: They were so sweet. They were bathing us in affection.
sentences.chinese: 他說道，“他們太可愛了，讓我們沐浴在熱情中。”

sentences.english: "It's not just about the cost, " Metz said.
sentences.chinese: “這不只是花費問題，”麥茲說道。

sentences.english: "It will take time for that risk to be erased from the minds of the Korean public, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “讓韓國民衆消除恐懼心理是需要時間的”，他說道。

sentences.english: "Oh you naughty Whisker, " said the old lady.
sentences.chinese: “唔，你這個調皮的威斯克呀，”老夫人說道。

sentences.english: “We shall attempt to answer it in this book, ” he wrote.
sentences.chinese: “我們將試圖在這本書中回答這個問題”，他說道。

definition: to ask the way/to ask
to nod
to shake one's head
in a low voice/softly
tone of voice/the way one speaks/manner of expression/tone
quietly/softly/neutral tone/light stress
to open one's mouth/to start to talk
just now/a moment ago
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
in a low voice/(speak) in whispers
to overdo it/to overstep the limit/excessively/above one's head/overhead
tone/manner of speaking/mood/CL:個|个[ge4]
to wave one's hand/to gesture with one's hand (beckoning, waving good-bye etc)/to swing one's arms
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
